mapper.select: SELECT T1.BFSVC_CSMB_DDLV_TP_CD /* BS소모품배부유형코드 */ , (SELECT Y.CSMB_PD_CD FROM TB_SVST_BFSVC_CSMB_BASE_DTL Y WHERE Y.MNGT_YM = T1.MNGT_YM AND Y.CSMB_PD_CD = T1.CSMB_PD_CD AND Y.BFSVC_CSMB_DDLV_OJ_CD = T1.BFSVC_CSMB_DDLV_OJ_CD AND Y.BFSVC_CSMB_DDLV_ORT_YN = T1.BFSVC_CSMB_DDLV_ORT_YN AND Y.BFSVC_CSMB_DDLV_TP_CD = '1' ) AS FXN_PD_CD /* 고정품목코드 */ , (SELECT X.BOX_UNIT_QTY || F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'MNGT_UNIT_CD', X.MNGT_UNIT_CD, 'ko') FROM TB_SVST_BFSVC_CSMB_BASE_BAS X , TB_SVST_BFSVC_CSMB_BASE_DTL Y WHERE X.MNGT_YM = Y.MNGT_YM AND X.CSMB_PD_CD = Y.CSMB_PD_CD AND Y.MNGT_YM = T1.MNGT_YM AND Y.CSMB_PD_CD = T1.CSMB_PD_CD AND Y.BFSVC_CSMB_DDLV_OJ_CD = T1.BFSVC_CSMB_DDLV_OJ_CD AND Y.BFSVC_CSMB_DDLV_ORT_YN = T1.BFSVC_CSMB_DDLV_ORT_YN AND Y.BFSVC_CSMB_DDLV_TP_CD = '1' ) AS FXN_PCKNG_UNIT /* 고정포장단위 */ , (SELECT Y.PD_NM FROM TB_SVST_BFSVC_CSMB_BASE_DTL X , TB_PDBS_PD_BAS Y WHERE X.CSMB_PD_CD = Y.PD_CD AND X.CSMB_PD_CD = T1.CSMB_PD_CD AND X.MNGT_YM = T1.MNGT_YM AND X.BFSVC_CSMB_DDLV_OJ_CD = T1.BFSVC_CSMB_DDLV_OJ_CD AND X.BFSVC_CSMB_DDLV_ORT_YN = T1.BFSVC_CSMB_DDLV_ORT_YN AND X.BFSVC_CSMB_DDLV_TP_CD = '1' ) AS FXN_PD_NM /* 고정품목명 */ , (SELECT Y.SAP_MAT_CD FROM TB_SVST_BFSVC_CSMB_BASE_DTL X , TB_PDBS_PD_BAS Y WHERE X.CSMB_PD_CD = Y.PD_CD AND X.MNGT_YM = T1.MNGT_YM AND X.CSMB_PD_CD = T1.CSMB_PD_CD AND X.BFSVC_CSMB_DDLV_OJ_CD = T1.BFSVC_CSMB_DDLV_OJ_CD AND X.BFSVC_CSMB_DDLV_ORT_YN = T1.BFSVC_CSMB_DDLV_ORT_YN AND X.BFSVC_CSMB_DDLV_TP_CD = '1' ) AS FXN_SAP_MAT_CD /* 고정SAP코드 */ , (SELECT Y.CSMB_PD_CD FROM TB_SVST_BFSVC_CSMB_BASE_DTL Y WHERE Y.MNGT_YM = T1.MNGT_YM AND Y.CSMB_PD_CD = T1.CSMB_PD_CD AND Y.BFSVC_CSMB_DDLV_OJ_CD = T1.BFSVC_CSMB_DDLV_OJ_CD AND Y.BFSVC_CSMB_DDLV_ORT_YN = T1.BFSVC_CSMB_DDLV_ORT_YN AND Y.BFSVC_CSMB_DDLV_TP_CD = '2' ) AS APLC_PD_CD /* 신청품목코드 */ , (SELECT X.BOX_UNIT_QTY || F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'MNGT_UNIT_CD', X.MNGT_UNIT_CD, 'ko') FROM TB_SVST_BFSVC_CSMB_BASE_BAS X , TB_SVST_BFSVC_CSMB_BASE_DTL Y WHERE X.MNGT_YM = Y.MNGT_YM AND X.CSMB_PD_CD = Y.CSMB_PD_CD AND Y.MNGT_YM = T1.MNGT_YM AND Y.CSMB_PD_CD = T1.CSMB_PD_CD AND Y.BFSVC_CSMB_DDLV_OJ_CD = T1.BFSVC_CSMB_DDLV_OJ_CD AND Y.BFSVC_CSMB_DDLV_ORT_YN = T1.BFSVC_CSMB_DDLV_ORT_YN AND Y.BFSVC_CSMB_DDLV_TP_CD = '2' ) AS APLC_PCKNG_UNIT /* 신청포장단위 */ , (SELECT Y.PD_NM FROM TB_SVST_BFSVC_CSMB_BASE_DTL X , TB_PDBS_PD_BAS Y WHERE X.CSMB_PD_CD = Y.PD_CD AND X.CSMB_PD_CD = T1.CSMB_PD_CD AND X.MNGT_YM = T1.MNGT_YM AND X.BFSVC_CSMB_DDLV_OJ_CD = T1.BFSVC_CSMB_DDLV_OJ_CD AND X.BFSVC_CSMB_DDLV_ORT_YN = T1.BFSVC_CSMB_DDLV_ORT_YN AND X.BFSVC_CSMB_DDLV_TP_CD = '2' ) AS APLC_PD_NM /* 신청품목명 */ , (SELECT Y.SAP_MAT_CD FROM TB_SVST_BFSVC_CSMB_BASE_DTL X , TB_PDBS_PD_BAS Y WHERE X.CSMB_PD_CD = Y.PD_CD AND X.MNGT_YM = T1.MNGT_YM AND X.CSMB_PD_CD = T1.CSMB_PD_CD AND X.BFSVC_CSMB_DDLV_OJ_CD = T1.BFSVC_CSMB_DDLV_OJ_CD AND X.BFSVC_CSMB_DDLV_ORT_YN = T1.BFSVC_CSMB_DDLV_ORT_YN AND X.BFSVC_CSMB_DDLV_TP_CD = '2' ) AS APLC_SAP_MAT_CD /* 신청SAP코드 */ , NULL AS QTY /* 수량 */ , T1.CSMB_PD_CD /* 소모품품목코드 */ , (SELECT Y.SAP_MAT_CD FROM TB_SVST_BFSVC_CSMB_BASE_DTL X , TB_PDBS_PD_BAS Y WHERE X.CSMB_PD_CD = Y.PD_CD AND X.MNGT_YM = T1.MNGT_YM AND X.CSMB_PD_CD = T1.CSMB_PD_CD AND X.BFSVC_CSMB_DDLV_OJ_CD = T1.BFSVC_CSMB_DDLV_OJ_CD AND X.BFSVC_CSMB_DDLV_ORT_YN = T1.BFSVC_CSMB_DDLV_ORT_YN ) AS SAP_MAT_CD /* SAP품목코드 */ FROM TB_SVST_BFSVC_CSMB_BASE_DTL T1 /* BS소모품기준상세 */ , TB_PDBS_PD_BAS T2 /* 상품기본 */ WHERE T1.CSMB_PD_CD = T2.PD_CD AND T1.BFSVC_CSMB_DDLV_OJ_CD = '2' AND T1.BFSVC_CSMB_DDLV_ORT_YN = 'Y' AND T1.MNGT_YM = #{mngtYm} ORDER BY T1.BFSVC_CSMB_DDLV_TP_CD, T1.SORT_ODR

SELECT T2.SORT_ODR , T1.STR_WARE_NO , T1.CSMB_PD_CD , T1.SAP_MAT_CD , NVL(T1.BFSVC_CSMB_DDLV_QTY, '0') AS BFSVC_CSMB_DDLV_QTY , T1.BFSVC_CSMB_DDLV_STAT_CD , (CASE WHEN T1.BFSVC_CSMB_DDLV_STAT_CD = '10' THEN '신청' WHEN T1.BFSVC_CSMB_DDLV_STAT_CD = '20' THEN '신청확인' WHEN T1.BFSVC_CSMB_DDLV_STAT_CD = '30' THEN '출고요청완료' ELSE '미신청' END ) AS REQ_YN , T2.BFSVC_CSMB_DDLV_TP_CD FROM TB_SVST_BFSVC_CSMB_DDLV_IZ T1 , TB_SVST_BFSVC_CSMB_BASE_DTL T2 WHERE T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND T1.BFSVC_CSMB_DDLV_OJ_CD = '2' AND T2.BFSVC_CSMB_DDLV_ORT_YN = 'Y' AND T1.MNGT_YM = T2.MNGT_YM AND T1.BFSVC_CSMB_DDLV_OJ_CD = T2.BFSVC_CSMB_DDLV_OJ_CD AND T1.CSMB_PD_CD = T2.CSMB_PD_CD AND T1.MNGT_YM = #{mngtYm} AND T1.STR_WARE_NO = #{prtnrNo} ORDER BY T2.BFSVC_CSMB_DDLV_TP_CD, T2.SORT_ODR

SELECT BIZ_STRTDT , SUBSTR(BIZ_STRT_HH, 0, 4) AS BIZ_STRT_HH , BIZ_ENDDT , SUBSTR(BIZ_END_HH, 0, 4) AS BIZ_END_HH FROM TB_SVST_BIZ_CL_BAS WHERE CL_MNGT_DV_CD = '6' AND DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND MNGT_YM = #{mngtYm}

SELECT MIN(STNRD_YR||STNRD_MN||STNRD_DY) AS BIZ_STRTDT , MAX(STNRD_YR||STNRD_MN||STNRD_DY) AS BIZ_ENDDT , '' AS BIZ_STRT_HH , '' AS BIZ_END_HH FROM T_CMY_CALR_M WHERE 1 = 1 AND TENANT_ID = 'TNT_WELLS' AND STNRD_YR = SUBSTR(#{mngtYm}, 1, 4) AND STNRD_MN = SUBSTR(#{mngtYm}, 5, 2) AND STNRD_YR||STNRD_MN||STNRD_DY NOT IN ( WITH T AS ( SELECT TO_DATE(SUBSTR(HLDY_APPY_START_DTM,1,8)) AS START_DATE, TO_DATE(SUBSTR(HLDY_APPY_FINS_DTM,1,8)) AS END_DATE FROM T_CMZ_HLDY_M WHERE 1 = 1 AND TENANT_ID = 'TNT_WELLS' AND (SUBSTR(HLDY_APPY_START_DTM,1,6) = #{mngtYm} OR SUBSTR(HLDY_APPY_FINS_DTM,1,6) = #{mngtYm}) ) SELECT TO_CHAR(START_DATE + LV - 1, 'YYYYMMDD') DT FROM T , (SELECT LEVEL LV FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <= 99) WHERE LV <= END_DATE - START_DATE + 1 )

SELECT T1.MNGT_YM , T1.BFSVC_CSMB_DDLV_OJ_CD , T1.STR_WARE_NO , T1.CSMB_PD_CD , T1.SAP_MAT_CD , T1.BFSVC_CSMB_DDLV_QTY , T1.BFSVC_CSMB_DDLV_STAT_CD , T1.OSTR_AK_NO , T1.OSTR_AK_SN , O2.BLD_CD FROM TB_SVST_BFSVC_CSMB_DDLV_IZ T1 INNER JOIN TB_OGBS_MM_PRTNR_IZ O1 ON O1.BASE_YM = T1.MNGT_YM AND O1.OG_TP_CD = 'W02' AND O1.PRTNR_NO = T1.STR_WARE_NO INNER JOIN TB_OGBS_MM_OG_IZ O2 ON O2.BASE_YM = O1.BASE_YM AND O2.OG_TP_CD = O1.OG_TP_CD AND O2.OG_ID = O1.OG_ID WHERE 1 = 1 AND T1.BFSVC_CSMB_DDLV_STAT_CD = '20' AND T1.BFSVC_CSMB_DDLV_OJ_CD = '2' AND T1.BFSVC_CSMB_DDLV_QTY > 0 AND T1.MNGT_YM = #{mngtYm} AND T1.STR_WARE_NO = #{strWareNo}

SELECT DISTINCT T2.SAP_MAT_CD , NVL(T1.BFSVC_CSMB_APLC_LM_QTY, 0) AS BFSVC_CSMB_APLC_LM_QTY FROM TB_SVST_BFSVC_CSMB_BASE_DTL T1 INNER JOIN TB_SVST_BFSVC_CSMB_DDLV_IZ T2 ON T2.MNGT_YM = T1.MNGT_YM AND T2.BFSVC_CSMB_DDLV_OJ_CD = T1.BFSVC_CSMB_DDLV_OJ_CD AND T2.CSMB_PD_CD = T1.CSMB_PD_CD WHERE 1 = 1 AND T1.BFSVC_CSMB_DDLV_OJ_CD = '2' AND T1.BFSVC_CSMB_DDLV_TP_CD = '2' AND T1.MNGT_YM = #{mngtYm}
